item.title: AboutMe
item.description: About Me Senior Technology and Machine Learning leader / Architect with 16+ years of diverse experience in delivering scalable and strategically differentiating technology platforms in e-Commerce, Supply Chain, On-Demand Transportation, Big Data and Social Networking by leading their conceptualization, architecture and delivery through organization wide partnerships.
